definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: These two kittens on this piece of double-sided embroidery look like real ones. They are really lovable.
sentences.chinese: 這幅雙面繡上的兩隻小貓維妙維肖，可愛極了。

sentences.english: The one in Beihai is unique in having dragons on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 北海里的那個是唯一一個雙面九龍壁。

sentences.english: He decided to go into politics despite his lineage as much as because of it, family members said.
sentences.chinese: 家人說，家世對於他從政的決定是雙面刃。

sentences.english: Using the ASTM indicators, measure the thickness of both lites of glass in the IG assembly.
sentences.chinese: 使用ASTM指示時，量測雙面復層玻璃的厚度。

sentences.english: Double coated strip tide, and has lateral pressure.
sentences.chinese: 雙面塗塑鋼帶擋潮，並具有抗側壓作用。

sentences.english: Set a two sides feed-in and feed-out devices and greatly reduce labor intensity.
sentences.chinese: 超聲波清洗機設雙面進出料裝置，大大降低勞動強度。

sentences.english: Rear projection screens use lenticular lens films as light dispersing components.
sentences.chinese: 一種背投屏，它把雙面凸狀透鏡膜作光色散元件。

sentences.english: Founded in 2006, specializing in the production of single double-sided hot stamping machine.
sentences.chinese: 創建於2006年，專業生產單雙面燙金機。

sentences.english: Three-dimensional image display device, portable terminal device, and lenticular lens.
sentences.chinese: 三維圖象顯示設備，便攜式終端設備，以及雙面透鏡。

sentences.english: The calf has two lower jaws, but only one mouth.
sentences.chinese: 這隻“雙面牛”有兩隻較短的下巴，但只有一張嘴。

sentences.english: The results show that the structure with two side chamfered edge can further reduce uncontinuous stress.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，雙面削邊結構可以進一步降低不連續應力。

sentences.english: If you do have to, print double-sided.
sentences.chinese: 若真的有必要，請使用雙面打印。

sentences.english: Both were then packaged into a specially designed two-sided container.
sentences.chinese: 然後將它們都打包進一個特製的雙面容器內。

sentences.english: Psalm 102 is like a two-sided coin.
sentences.chinese: 《詩篇》第102章的內容就像一枚雙面的硬幣。

sentences.english: First, double-sided tape adhering to the cold laminating film being mounted on the back of map.
sentences.chinese: 首先要將雙面膠紙粘貼在被裱的冷裱膜圖的背面。

sentences.english: This is a typical case of double-dealing.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種典型的雙面人的做法。

definition: vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
